name: Slender Man | Game Challenge
description: This is My game I made in 3 days Slender Man. You were driving on a dark night listening to a podcast. You end up losing control of the car and crash all the way into the woods. You heard a voice that said to gather all 5 peace's of the papers when you are done you will be able to survive if you don't collect papers in time well you die.. Enjoy :)
